body.script: var elem = document.getElementById("qrcode"); var qrcode = new QRCode(elem, { width : 100, height : 100 }); function makeCode () { var elText = document.getElementById("text"); if (elText.value === "") { //alert("Input a text"); //elText.focus(); return; } qrcode.makeCode(elText.value); } makeCode(); document.getElementById("text").onkeyup = function (e) { makeCode(); };
